title: The "Mayuri" Nakshi Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Telugu Treasure
materials: Finest 22K Gold (916 Gold) intricately set with Dazzling Natural Diamonds
and Tassels of South Sea Pearls; Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases exceptional Nakshi craftsmanship, a signature of South Indian jewelry. The elaborate floral and peacock (Mayuri) motifs are intricately hand-carved. Features square emeralds, light purple stone details, accented by delicate pink bead tassels. The 'Gutta-pusalu' inspired pearl drops add a touch of classic charm. The complex detailing is further enhanced by the Hyderabadi polish, giving it a rich, antique-like finish.
colors: Predominantly golden hue with the sparkle of brilliant white diamonds
contrasted with the regal green of emeralds
and the soft blush of pink pearl drops and ruby accents
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations like weddings (Vivahaalu)
and other auspicious Telugu ceremonies. A statement piece for the modern bride seeking a blend of tradition and elegance
also suited for high-end cultural events.
description: A rare blend of traditional Telugu artistry and modern sophistication. The meticulous Nakshi work, combined with the brilliance of natural diamonds and the allure of emeralds and pearls, makes this Haaram a true heirloom piece. Symbolizing prosperity, love, and new beginnings, it is an investment in timeless beauty and cultural heritage. Its exceptional craftsmanship ensures durability, making it a treasure to be passed down through generations.
